A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where as The Force Awakens just play things safe and was just a bunch of mystery boxes\, The Last Jedi actually focuses on making the new characters really matter in their own way without having to rely on old plot points from past films\, Rian journeys the characters through new experiences\, even old fan favorite characters like Luke are able to still develop in new ways\, rather than stay their traiditional note. While not every character moment was a sure hit and sometimes the humor was misplaced in some moments\, its still the most exciting star wars experience I felt since Disney started producing them. It's time to really start seeing new things and new perspectives on this universe.
